title: The Dragon and the Unicorn
description: A quest for immortality that spans all history, human and demihuman, from the hunt for the unicorn's horn to the ceaseless wars of elf and dragon, begins and ends in Tintagel, a legendary place at the edge of the Western Sea, where the first cry of a newborn king called Arthur is heard. Reprint.
author: A.A. Attanasio
